@jeancarl @LinaSeiche #bitcoin is infinitely divisible. Currently down to 8 decimal places, which is called a Satoshi. 1 USD = 2000 Satoshi’s. You can own 1 million Satoshis (0.01 Bitcoin) for $460. By the year 2050, I think we will be pricing in micro-Satoshi.
